item.title: 众议院委员会提议修改联邦土地上的石油和煤炭开采政策
item.description: 众议院的一个小组本周将审议对国家石油和天然气钻探计划的全面修改，包括要求在墨西哥湾和阿拉斯加进行数十次租约出售，这些修改可能会在即将通过的预算法案中获得通过。【原文：A House of Representatives panel this week will consider sweeping changes to the nation's oil and gas drilling programs, including requiring dozens of lease sales in the Gulf of Mexico and Alaska, that could be passed in an impending budget bill.】

item.title: 威廉姆斯首席执行官艾伦-阿姆斯特朗（Alan Armstrong）在执掌公司 14 年后将卸任
item.description: 威廉姆斯公司（Williams Companies）周一表示，首席执行官艾伦-阿姆斯特朗（Alan Armstrong）将在执掌这家美国输油管道运营商超过 14 年后卸任。【原文：Williams Companies said on Monday CEO Alan Armstrong will step down after more than 14 years at the helm of the U.S. pipeline operator.】

item.title: 美国 TVA 负责人建议延长煤电厂寿命，环保组织誓言抗争
item.description: 美国田纳西河流域管理局（Tennessee Valley Authority）负责人表示，该公司的四座燃煤发电厂在计划于 2035 年关闭后仍可继续运营，环保组织周一对此表示抨击。【原文：Environmental groups on Monday slammed comments by the head of the U.S.-owned Tennessee Valley Authority suggesting the utility's four coal-fired power plants could continue to operate after a planned shutdown in 2035.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）采取行动，撤销对卡尔希事件合约案的上诉
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission）周一决定放弃对一项法院判决的上诉，该判决允许纽约衍生品交易平台 KalshiEX LLC 列出美国人可以用来押注选举结果的合约。【原文：The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission on Monday moved to drop its appeal of a court decision that allowed New York derivatives trading platform KalshiEX LLC to list contracts Americans can use to bet on election outcomes.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：普华永道会计师事务所将在美国裁员 1500 人
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一报道，四大会计师事务所普华永道将在美国裁员约1500人。【原文：Big Four accounting firm PwC is laying off about 1,500 employees in the U.S., the Financial Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 百时美施贵宝首席执行官表示，5 年内将在美国投资 400 亿美元
item.description: 百时美施贵宝公司首席执行官克里斯托弗-博纳（Christopher Boerner）在《统计新闻》（Stat News）周一发表的一篇评论文章中写道：未来五年，百时美施贵宝公司将在美国投入 400 亿美元。【原文：Bristol Myers Squibb will spend $40 billion in the US over the next five years, CEO Christopher Boerner wrote in an opinion piece published by Stat News on Monday.】

item.title: 交易日：关税不确定性依然存在
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 页岩气生产商科特拉能源公司（Coterra Energy）公布季度利润增长，下调支出目标
item.description: 美国页岩油生产商科特拉能源公司（Coterra Energy）周一公布第一季度利润增长，但表示将降低年度资本支出计划，以应对宏观经济的不确定性。【原文：U.S. shale producer Coterra Energy reported a rise in first-quarter profit on Monday, but said it would lower its annual capital expenditure plan in response to the macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 独家报道：美国加征关税，Shein和Temu加大在英国和法国的广告投放力度
item.description: 市场情报公司Sensor Tower的数据显示，4月份，从中国发货的快时尚电商平台Shein和Temu增加了在欧洲的数字广告支出。【原文：Shein and Temu, fast-fashion e-commerce platforms that ship merchandise from China, boosted their spending on digital ads in Europe in April, data from market intelligence firm Sensor Tower showed, a shift away from the U.S., where the companies face crushing tariffs.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁格奥尔基耶娃表示，IMF一直认为中国需要改变经济模式
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周一表示，国际货币基金组织一直在为中国摆脱出口导向型增长模式开出政策处方。【原文：International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva on Monday said the IMF has been vocal about its policy prescriptions for China to move away from an export-led growth model.】

item.title: 面对市场不确定性，KKR 联合创始人表示 "保持冷静，继续前进
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易政策的不确定性导致全球股市暴跌，KKR 联合创始人乔治-罗伯茨（George Roberts）周一试图缓解投资者的焦虑情绪。【原文：KKR co-founder George Roberts tried to ease investor anxiety on Monday as uncertainty over U.S. President Donald Trump's trade policies have caused global stock markets to swoon.】

item.title: 经济不确定性导致消费需求疲软，高乐氏下调年度销售预期
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税引发的经济不确定性，漂白剂生产商消费需求疲软，高乐氏（Clorox）周一下调了年度销售预期。【原文：Clorox trimmed its annual sales forecast on Monday, as the bleach maker saw weak consumer demand in the backdrop of economic uncertainty spurred by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 由于囊性纤维化药物需求低于预期，Vertex 公司季度业绩不佳
item.description: 由于囊性纤维化（CF）药物 Trikafta 的销售低于预期，Vertex 制药公司周一的季度业绩未能达到华尔街的预期。【原文：Vertex Pharmaceuticals missed Wall Street estimates for quarterly results on Monday, due to lower-than-expected sales of its cystic fibrosis (CF) drug Trikafta.】

item.title: 米尔肯公司担忧关税，高管们努力保持冷静
item.description: 尽管人们担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策会给经济放缓蒙上一层阴影，但华尔街的首席执行官们和交易商们周一在比佛利山庄举行的一次备受瞩目的投资者聚会上仍力图保持冷静的基调。【原文：Wall Street chief executives and dealmakers sought to strike a calm tone at a high-profile investor gathering in Beverly Hills on Monday, despite fears of an economic slowdown as U.S. President Donald Trump's trade policies cast a long shadow.】

item.title: 芭比娃娃母公司美泰撤销预测，将提高美国价格，因为关税增加了成本
item.description: 芭比娃娃母公司美泰公司周一撤回了其年度财务目标，并表示将提高美国部分产品的价格，以应对因特朗普政府对主要贸易伙伴全面征收关税而导致的投入成本增加。【原文：Barbie-parent Mattel withdrew its annual financial targets on Monday and said it would increase prices for some products in the U.S. to counter higher input costs due to the Trump administration's sweeping tariffs on key trading partners.】

item.title: 人工智能需求旺盛，Palantir上调年度收入预期
item.description: 数据和分析公司 Palantir Technologies 周一上调了年度销售预期，押注于帮助企业采用生成式人工智能技术的产品的强劲需求。【原文：Data and analytics firm Palantir Technologies raised its annual sales forecast on Monday, betting on strong demand for its products that help businesses adopt generative AI technology.】

item.title: 福特撤回指导，警告称将因特朗普关税遭受 15 亿美元的打击
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税的不确定性，福特汽车公司（Ford Motor）周一暂停了其年度指导，称征税将使公司调整后的息税前利润减少约 15 亿美元。【原文：Ford Motor suspended its annual guidance on Monday because of uncertainty around U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, saying the levies would cost the company about $1.5 billion in adjusted earnings before interest and taxes.】

item.title: EIA 称，供应问题和合规成本推动加州燃料价格上涨
item.description: 美国能源信息署周一表示，由于供应问题、环保合规和燃料要求带来的成本以及高额的州税费，加州驾驶员在加油站支付的油价高于全国任何其他州。【原文：Drivers in California pay higher prices at the pump than any other state in the country due to supply issues, costs from environmental compliance and fuel requirements, and high state taxes and fees, the U.S. Energy Information Administration said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国驱逐航空公司 GlobalX 网站遭黑客篡改
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发起的驱逐到萨尔瓦多离岸拘留中心运动的中心航空公司的一个网站遭到黑客篡改。【原文：The airline at the center of President Donald Trump's campaign of deportations to an offshore detention center in El Salvador has had one of its websites defaced by hackers.】

item.title: 参议院最高民主党人要求调查纽瓦克航班问题
item.description: 参议院民主党领袖查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）周一呼吁对曼哈顿郊外纽瓦克机场因设备和人员问题而导致航班持续中断的事件进行调查。【原文：Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer on Monday called for a probe into a probe into ongoing flight disruptions at Newark airport outside Manhattan that have disrupted hundreds of flights over the last eight days because of equipment and staffing issues.】

item.title: 哈达德称巴西经济每年可增长 3
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周一表示，巴西有条件以年均 3% 的速度增长，这是总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）政府的目标。【原文：Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Monday the country has the conditions to grow at an average pace of 3% per year, which is the goal of President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva's administration.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷与美国司法部就税务案达成协议，将支付 5.11 亿美元
item.description: 瑞银集团周一表示，在与美国司法部达成协议后，瑞士信贷服务公司将支付 5.11 亿美元，以执行其 2014 年在税务问题上的认罪协议。【原文：UBS said on Monday that Credit Suisse Services will pay $511 million after reaching an agreement with the U.S. Department of Justice for its implementation of its 2014 guilty plea in tax matters.】

item.title: 特朗普顾问使用的应用程序称，在接到黑客攻击报告后暂时停止服务
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的前国家安全顾问迈克-瓦尔兹（Mike Waltz）使用的通信应用程序称，在据报道黑客攻击暴露了其部分信息后，该应用程序将暂时停止服务。【原文：The communications app used by U.S. President Donald Trump's former national security adviser, Mike Waltz, says it is temporarily suspending services following a reported hack that exposed some of its messages.】

item.title: 改变重组计划，OpenAI 将继续由非营利组织控制
item.description: OpenAI 将继续由一家非营利组织控制，这家处于人工智能生成热潮核心的初创公司周一表示，在此之前几个月，该公司曾概述了改革其结构以创建一家公益公司的计划，这将使其更容易筹集资金。【原文：OpenAI will remain under the control of a non-profit, the startup at the heart of the generative artificial intelligence boom said on Monday, months after it outlined plans to revamp its structure to create a public benefit corporation that would make it easier to raise capital.】

item.title: 特朗普政府寻求对反竞争法规进行身份认证
item.description: 美国政府周一表示，美国联邦贸易委员会和司法部正在努力查明反竞争的政府法规。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission and the Department of Justice are seeking to identify anticompetitive government regulations, the administration said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储会议前，债券投资者坚持中性立场
item.description: 在美联储本周召开为期两天的货币政策会议之前，债券投资者采取了中性立场，这反映了他们对美国贸易政策的持续谨慎态度，因为该政策有可能使世界最大经济体陷入衰退。【原文：Bond investors have taken a neutral stance in the run-up to the Federal Reserve's two-day monetary policy meeting this week, reflecting continued caution over U.S. trade policy that threatens to plunge the world's largest economy into recession.】

item.title: Rivian 将耗资 1.2 亿美元在伊利诺伊州建设供应商园区，以降低关税相关成本
item.description: Rivian 周一表示，公司将投资 1.2 亿美元，将其关键零部件供应商引入伊利诺伊州的工厂附近，因为这家电动汽车制造商正努力降低美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对墨西哥和加拿大征收关税的影响。【原文：Rivian said on Monday that it will invest $120 million to bring its key parts suppliers near its plant in Illinois, as the electric vehicle-maker seeks to lower the impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs on Mexico and Canada.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Banorte 公司退出对 Banamex 的潜在竞购
item.description: 墨西哥银行 Banorte 首席执行官马科斯-拉米雷斯（Marcos Ramirez）在周一发表的一篇采访中告诉当地报纸《Milenio》，Banorte 不考虑竞购花旗银行去年在墨西哥分拆的零售部门 Banamex。【原文：Mexican lender Banorte is not considering making a bid for Banamex, Citi's one-time retail unit in the country which it split off last year, CEO Marcos Ramirez told local newspaper Milenio in an interview published on Monday.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司为价值 160 亿美元的智利绿色氢气项目申请许可
item.description: 周一的一份监管文件显示，能源巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）的子公司已为智利南部一个价值 160 亿美元的绿色氢气和合成氨项目申请环境许可证。【原文：Subsidiaries of energy major TotalEnergies have applied for an environmental permit for a $16 billion green hydrogen and ammonia project in southern Chile, a regulatory filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 摩根大通称人工智能有助于在市场动荡中提高销售额和增加客户数量
item.description: 摩根大通资产与财富管理首席执行官表示，摩根大通的人工智能工具使其能够提高对富裕客户的销售额，即使在 4 月份的市场衰退期间也能管理来自忧虑客户的大量请求。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's artificial intelligence tools enabled it to boost sales to wealthy clients and manage scores of requests from worried customers even during April's market rout, the bank's CEO of asset and wealth management said.】
